title: KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky
descriptions:
KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky

Meet the compact, lightweight hand mixer that delivers big performance. The KitchenAid KHM512 in Aqua Sky offers 5 precise speeds to handle everything from gentle stirring to powerful whipping, making it a versatile essential for everyday baking and cooking.

Key features:
- 5 speeds: 
  - Speed 1: Slowly stir in chunky ingredients like nuts or chocolate chips.
  - Speed 5: Whip egg whites or heavy cream to airy perfection.
- Turbo Beaters: Includes 2 Stainless Steel Turbo Beater accessories designed for thorough mixing of cookie dough, mashed potatoes, meringues, and more.
- Easy accessory release: Single-handed press button for quick beater removal.
- Lockable swivel cord: Adjusts to either side for right- or left-handed use and keeps the cord out of your way.
- Dishwasher-safe accessories: Stainless steel beaters clean up fast in the dishwasher.
- Compact and lightweight design: Easy to handle, use, and store.

Perfect for:
- Mixing nuts and chocolate chips into batters
- Whipping meringues, egg whites, and heavy cream
- Preparing cookie dough and fluffy mashed potatoes
- Stirring in chunky ingredients without overmixing

Brand you can trust:
- #1 Mixer Brand in the World, based on Euromonitor International Ltd.; retail sales revenue, USD, all retail channels. Learn more at mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com.

What’s in the box:
- KitchenAid KHM512 Hand Mixer (Aqua Sky)
- 2 Stainless Steel Turbo Beater accessories

Effortless control, reliable power, and a sleek Aqua Sky finish—this hand mixer is your go-to for quick tasks and everyday creations.
